name: Stitch Fix, Inc.
description: Stitch Fix, Inc. is a personalized online shopping service that delivers curated clothing and accessories straight to customers' doors. Founded in 2011 by Katrina Lake, Stitch Fix leverages data science and a team of expert stylists to provide a unique shopping experience tailored to individual preferences and styles. Customers begin by completing a style profile that captures their fashion choices, sizes, and budget, allowing Stitch Fix to hand-pick items that match their tastes. The service operates on a subscription model, where users can receive regular 'Fixes' containing a selection of apparel and accessories, which they can try on at home and purchase only what they love. With an extensive range of brands and styles, Stitch Fix caters to a diverse clientele, including men, women, and children. The company is committed to using data analytics to improve customer satisfaction and enhance the shopping experience, making it a leader in the online retail space. Stitch Fix's mission is to inspire personal style and empower customers to express themselves through fashion, all while making the shopping process enjoyable and convenient. The company has also expanded its offerings to include a wider variety of sizes and styles, ensuring inclusivity for all shoppers.

seo.meta_title: Stitch Fix, Inc. | Personalized Clothing Subscription Service
seo.meta_description: Discover Stitch Fix, Inc., a personalized online shopping service that delivers curated clothing to your door. Explore our unique approach to fashion and style.

faq.question: What is Stitch Fix?
faq.answer: Stitch Fix is a personalized online shopping service that curates clothing and accessories based on your style profile.

faq.question: How does Stitch Fix work?
faq.answer: Customers fill out a style profile, and Stitch Fix stylists choose items to send in a 'Fix' for customers to try on at home.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Stitch Fix?
faq.answer: Katrina Lake is the CEO of Stitch Fix, Inc.

faq.question: What types of products does Stitch Fix offer?
faq.answer: Stitch Fix offers a variety of clothing for men, women, and children, as well as accessories like bags and jewelry.
